name: WhatsApp Undo Button
description:
WhatsApp Introduced Delete Feature and when you delete a message, there are features Delete for Everyone and Delete for Me, but sometimes by mistake, we tap on 'Delete for Me' and the message gets deleted from chat but it gets delivered to other ends, which is more dangerous and gives headache sometimes.

So I designed 'Undo' feature which gives 5 sec to recover the deleted message and you get another chance to delete for everyone.
